price: Bizim onlara yönelttiğimiz tehditleri sana göstermeye elbette gücümüz yeter.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
